vscode.name: Prettier
vscode.description: Prettier is a Code Formatter that help you to organize your code,and it Support a lot of Programming Languages.

vscode.name: Better Comments
vscode.description: Better comments is nice VS Code Extension that allow you to Write Nice and beautifull comments.

vscode.name: Auto Close Tag
vscode.description: When you work with HTML you may forget to close tag, This VS Code Extension is Nice for You.

vscode.name: Indent Rainbow
vscode.description: If you work with a lot of lines of code, you may make a mistake like forget opening and closing tags or other mistakes, But with this extansion you will not make this mistake again.

vscode.name: JEST
vscode.description: If You use JEST Framework in Your Testing Process, This is nice extension for You, Jest EXtension giev you testing result withour run testing task in yoru Terminal.

vscode.name: Live Server
vscode.description: Live Server is the Most famous VS Code Extensions that let you to run locla server in your Machine to see changes Immediately.

vscode.name: Material Icon Theme
vscode.description: Nice Extension that give You nice and beatiful files icons, like javascript, python...etc, Material Icon Theme Extension supports Folders Icon too.

vscode.name: Path Intellisense
vscode.description: Excellent Extension that help you to handle paths in your imports, Autocomplete Filenames and more

vscode.name: Simple React Snippets
vscode.description: If You are React Developer this Extansion is an important to you, It helps you to create Big code by some Shortcuts which ease your development Process.

vscode.name: Tailwind CSS IntelliSense
vscode.description: Nice Extension that help you if you are use Tailwind CSS Developer, It help you by suggest tailwind properties during your Work.

vscode.name: Turbo Console Log
vscode.description: This Extension help you when you want to log some data in Console, It log data in console with some extra information like line, variable's name and more.

vscode.name: Tokyo Night
vscode.description: Nice Theme that I start Using in VS Code Editor, It have nice colors and other Features.

vscode.name: Snapcode
vscode.description: Nice Extension that help you to take beatiful snapshot to specific piece of code.

vscode.name: Rainbow Tags
vscode.description: Nice VS Code Extension that colorize HTML Tags, which help you to know start and end of the Tag.

vscode.name: Ayu
vscode.description: A nother Nice Theme for VS Code Editor that give you a Professional SHapeand Colors.

vscode.name: Headwind
vscode.description: The Big Problem in Tailwind CSS is that you may write a lot of classes and that make you to forget to oganize these classes, Headwind came to solve this problem, It ReArrange all Tailwind classes when you save the file.

vscode.name: Git Lens
vscode.description: Nice Extension that give you ability to handle your repos graphically and by easy way.

packages.name: joi
packages.description: Joi is and npm package that used to handle validation process for your forms, it contains alot of awesome methods and properties that let you to validate your forms by easy way.

packages.name: SWR
packages.description: SWR is an React hook that give you all you need to fetch data from APIs Endpoints and handle it in you Frontend Project, It isnot just as normal fetch library like axios of fetch, it give you alot of features like pagination, mutation and more

packages.name: JSON Server
packages.description: JSON Server is a VS Code Extension that let you to apply CRUD Operations like get, post, put, delete...etc on and locally data in your machine and it is usful if you are frontend developer and you want to test your fetching process.

packages.name: Axios
packages.description: Axios is the most library that used in fetching data from APIs process, is has a lot of features and properties that ease fetching process.

packages.name: Sweet Alert
packages.description: Normal alerts in JavaScript has a lot of problems like bloking code from excution and more problems, Sweet Alert coming to solve this problem, It give Us nice Alerts that not contains problems.

packages.name: React Toastify
packages.description: React Toastify is a NPM Package that give Us nice Toasts and with different shapes and colors like error, info, success and warning so if you are frontend developer you shoud try It.

packages.name: Formik
packages.description: Handling Forms is a difficult process that take a lot of time, Formik Library came to solve this problem, It give us a lot of hooks and functions that help us to handle events like submitting event.

packages.name: React Hook Form
packages.description: React Hook Form is like Formik that used to handle Forms with great preformance and it suitable for large scale forms.

packages.name: Chart JS
packages.description: Chart JS is an npm package that used to insert animated and interactive informations components.

packages.name: React QR Reader
packages.description: Nice Package that used to read QR Code, It's usage is very simple but have a great benefit.

packages.name: QR Code React
packages.description: Nice Package that used to Create QR Code, It's usage is very simple but have a great benefit.

packages.name: React Syntax Highlighter
packages.description: One of my favourite package that use in this project it give you ability to add code blocks in frontend applications, It support a lot of languages and tens of great themes that make your project looks good.

packages.name: Framer Motion
packages.description: Nice Library that help you to implement advanced animations in your website, So if you dealing a lot with animations you should use it to ease you work.

packages.name: React Typed
packages.description: Creat NPM Package that will help you to add Typing Writer Effect, which will add nice feature to your website.

packages.name: Styled Components
packages.description: The best package in my opinion to implement css in js that you can use it in your frontend application.

packages.name: Chart JS 2
packages.description: Nice npm package that will ease your work with chartjs library if you use React JS.

packages.name: Howler
packages.description: Great library that will help you in if you dealing with Audio in your Applications, It have great features and methods that ease Audio handling Process.

packages.name: Lodash
packages.description: This Library you must use it, It is Great Library that have a lot of functions that will ease your work with javascript..

packages.name: Owl Carousel
packages.description: Nice Library that contains Great and responsive Carousels that you can use it in your website.

websites.name: Fancy Border Rdaius Generator
websites.description: Awesome website to Create any CSS Border Radius shapes by Easy way, WHich will speed your development process.

websites.name: Heroicon
websites.description: Nice website that will give you beatiful icons as svg format to implement in your application without installing libraries like Fontawesome.

websites.name: CSS Gradient Generator
websites.description: Great Website that help you to make CSS gradients by easy way, which speed your development process.

websites.name: Browser Frame
websites.description: Nice website that help you to put your Images in nice frames like Chrome, Safari and Mozilla Browsers and with different themes Like Dark and Light Theme.

websites.name: Getwaves
websites.description: Getwaves is great website that will give you svg wave and with different shapes to implement it in your website.

websites.name: JSON Placeholder
websites.description: Great Website that give you fake APIs End Points to use it in your applications.

websites.name: JEST Cheat Sheet
websites.description: Nice website that give you some of jest topics and methods that you can revision jest funcions and methods from it..

programms.name: VS Code
programms.description: The most populer code editor that every developer should used it at least once, It have all features that speed your development process.

programms.name: Sublime Text
programms.description: Another nice Code Editor that have nice and great features that will help you in your work as a Programmer.

programms.name: Atom
programms.description: Atom is one of my favourite code Editors that I was using it in Starting Journey, It have a lot of features that will speed your work.

chrome.name: JSON Formatter
chrome.description: Nice chrome Extension that Reformate JSON string into a nice and interactive shape, Which ease dealing with data..

chrome.name: React Devtools
chrome.description: React Devtools is an awesome tool that helps you to analyze and debug react applications, like showing status, props, and all component details.

chrome.name: Fonts Ninja
chrome.description: Great chrome extension that help you to know fonts name in any website that you want, So it will be great tool for you as a frontedn developer.

chrome.name: Grepper
chrome.description: Nice and very good chrome extension that help you in the development process by shoeing your problem solution in google search result, So You should try it.

chrome.name: Redux Devtools
chrome.description: Great Extension if you use Redux, It give You all tools to debug analyze store and all reducers in your application.

chrome.name: Wappalyzer
chrome.description: As a developer sumtimes you want to know the technologies that used in a specific website, This extension solve this problem, It tell you every technologies that is used in any website.

chrome.name: Web Developer
chrome.description: Another Great Chrome Extension that Contains Nice tools for You as a Web developer, It let you disable javascript or CSS from your website and more tools that absolutely will help you in your development process.

chrome.name: Responsive Viewer
chrome.description: As a frontend web developer you should test your application if it is responsive or not in chrome or firefox dev tools, these tools are limited in size but with Responsive Viewer, you can test your website on every screen that you like and you can show more one view to compare your website on different screens.

chrome.name: Lorem Generator
chrome.description: We may need random text to test a frontend website and know how it will be, Lorem Generator Extension will solve this problem, It makes you random text with any length that you want.

chrome.name: Web developer Checklist
chrome.description: Great extension that helps you to make your application 100% true and ideal, It test your website and gives you what your website needs to be Ideal.
